solution_line_template: Micah can type {micah_wpm} x {minutes_per_hour} = <<{micah_wpm}*{minutes_per_hour}={micah_wph}>>{micah_wph} words in an hour.
Isaiah can type {isaiah_wpm} x {minutes_per_hour} = <<{isaiah_wpm}*{minutes_per_hour}={isaiah_wph}>>{isaiah_wph} words in an hour.
Isaiah can type {isaiah_wph} - {micah_wph} = <<{isaiah_wph}-{micah_wph}={difference_in_words}>>{difference_in_words} words more than Micah in an hour.
